knownrelatives: Mrs. Chandler (mother), Ray Chandler, Keith Chandler (brothers, three other unidentified brothers), Rick Jones (husband)
powers: Marlo had no superhuman powers or abilities. She possessed the strength of an Earth women of her age, size and weight that indulged in moderate exercise.
significantissues: Rick confronted Hulk's arch-foe the Leader, who revealed that he could save her (Incredible Hulk #400, 1992)
Marlo Chandler married Rick Jones (Incredible Hulk #418, 1993)
Marlo went to Vegas for a few days after her separation from Rick (Captain Marvel #1, 2000)
attacks Banner and Skaar as the new Harpy (Incredible Hulk #604)
Marlo and Rick split up (World War Hulks #1, 2010)
